meaningMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>clear up</kanji>, so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to clear up</vocabulary>. It also means <vocabulary>to become sunny</vocabulary> as well.
readingMnemonic: The reading you learned with the kanji is the one you use here. One of those words where the kun'yomi's going to be more useful.
